description: Quotient cycle length in continued fraction expansion of sqrt(2^n-1).
example: For n=7 and n=8 the quotient periods are: [[11], [3, 1, 2, 2, 7, 11, 7, 2, 2, 1, 3, 22]] and [[15], [1, 30]] with period lengths 12 and 2 respectively.
mathematica: Table[Length@ Last@ ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[2^n - 1]], {n, 2, 56}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 21 2015 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 28 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Naohiro Nomoto_, Nov 09 2001
